author: Kirsty T97
comment: PLEASE FIX!  I love the app, been using it since I was 15. However there's a problem with saving stories. I've been trying to write a new story and it's simply not saving. If i log out it deletes the story completely. I thought it might be my phone but I've tried it on my tablet and on the website as well but nothing is working. Please fix it.

author: Shakira Young
comment: Wattpad is trash. Especially when you try to save a chapter but then it messes up the whole book interface. I couldn't even get into my other books, it just appears blank

author: danicliffo
comment: There are always bugs when I try to fix or edit my stories. Sometimes it won't save, and even if it does, the format completely changes. Just be good! Don't add any more stuff and mumbo jumbo to it. We need a good writing/reading app that will tend to our needs. I've been using this app since I was in High school and I really like it. But things like this makes me have trust issues. We (the writers), take time and energy to write those parts, not for them to be deleted. Please, please. Hear us out.

author: Laura Alvarez
comment: This app used to be very good, now...not so much. Constantly login off, and it takes forever to log on again. Sooo many updates, but it doesn't get any better. That's why you shouldn't try to fix what wasn't broken in the first place.

author: Randomness- -girl
comment: The app is okay but with the new update is UNBEARABLY slow. Im waiting up to ten minutes at worst for my stories to load, even with an extremely strong internet connection. This is unacceptable and needs to be fixed.
Been reading stories with this app and its a wonderful experience. Nothings perfect so sometimes i get to face troubles in opening the app but still, it is a good app. Two thumbs up 😍😍🖒🖒

author: jıмıи ̈
comment: The app doesn't work! Signed in so many times and still sends me these words "unable log you in at the moment, please try again later (13)"

author: Zodiacgamer Zodiac
comment: I can give you a 5 stars but when im editing my stories sometimes it wont publish i tried again later and it still says an error occured and it always so slow to load up my stories sometimes when i press the edit button it works but it only shows at the top edit story thats it i cant see my story there i only see at the top edit story pls fix this and also why cant i connect to wattpad

reply.author: Wattpad.com
reply.content: Hey Wattpadder! We’re really sorry to hear about the errors that you have been experiencing on Wattpad. We were recently experiencing outages which did affect various aspects of our system, which have now been resolved by our developers. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and we hope the issue is resolved for you now!

author: Jordyn Parry
comment: I literally live on this app! The books are so great and the people are amazing!! Its so easy to use and so very convinent! I definitely recommend it for every one! There are thousands of books to choose from and read as well as the wide variety of genres!! The ads are minimal and the people are so kind. It is so worth the download!!
The app is nice but i don't really like the latest update where you cant play the video while reading if you can please return that update

author: Random Fnaf and Aphmau Fan
comment: I will never ever stop using this. It is so much fun to read other people's stories and I really love having people read mine too! I recommend this app to anyone who likes books and who likes writing books!😊😊😊
title: BEST BOOK APP EVER!!

comment: This is the best app I have ever downloaded so far. There are many good stories to read, it's a place where I spend my free time and I get to interact with the authors and readers, sharing thoughts and all thank you wattpad I really luv u..😂

author: Manjima Paul
comment: I loved it. Wattpad has helped me to discover who I am and has inspired me to become an author when I grow up. I can write my stories and get constructive criticism, which is exactly what I want.

author: ceasar venus
comment: I really regret that i update this because it's SO SLOW im waiting for the story to load for about 5 minutes, please fix this as soon as possible, then i'll rate it 5 stars tnx.

author: No Name
comment: Other than getting booted out of stories for no reason, the app is great for reading in bed.

author: Bts_anna_ Kpop lover
comment: The app is great but it would be better if we had group chats instead of commenting on someone's book like it's a group chat

comment: i found Past sins, but its not the full book tho.
title: its ok.

comment: A lot of books disappeared from my library. Please fix this.

comment: I like it but lately I have been updating my books but people are not getting the notifications from it and it's not showing up in my activity

author: Gretchen A.
comment: Use this app, probably way too much in my everyday life. I absolutely love it.

author: J999 999
comment: This app is for those book lovers out there who don't have enough money to buy books.

I love this app! Its sometimes a way to commubicate with friends who either write or read and it gives us something to talk about at school. I love the stories and creativity of most authors Ive seen/read and its great. I ADORE this app

author: Pratiksha Manikwar
comment: Its an amazing app and I just loved it . Can't imagine any better than this .  And got interested towards writing because of this app . Just amazing. Loved it

Best app for reading ever. Great for all ages.
I like everything about the app.  But i wanted it to have an Audio reader in the up coming updates if its possible I'm really looking forward to it. I love wattpad 💓
